greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Replace 2^i with n^i in binary representation of n.
comment: The following sequences all appear to have the same parity: A003071, A029886, A061297, A092524, A093431, A102393, A104258, A122248, A128975. - _Jeremy Gardiner_, Dec 28 2008
program: (PARI) a(n) = my(b=binary(n)); sum(k=1, #b, b[k]*n^(#b-k)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 19 2015
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Mar 05 2005
